itunes:title: Episode 508 - A Grunt's Life
title: Episode 508 - A Grunt's Life
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with audience favorite VET TV President Donny O'Malley as he discusses his new feature film "A Grunt's Life" and why Amazon banned it, the opening day kick-off party for Ross and Dan's campaign whi...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with audience favorite VET TV President Donny O'Malley as he discusses his new feature film "A Grunt's Life" and why Amazon banned it, the opening day kick-off party for Ross and Dan's campaign which you are invited to, why Donny will probably marry a 20 year old, a start date for our movie "The Janitor", and how Donny destroyed his doctor's records to enlist in the military.

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
